name: Ink & Yuki
description:
Ink & Yuki, is a co-op multiplayer Collectathon with a unique monochromatic art style, inspiration from classics of the genre as well as classic Chinese ink paintings. The game features two stages and 35 collectable items, along with a fully fledged multiplayer experience.

This game was made for the 2022 Meow Game Jam.The theme was breaking boundaries, and I went for that from an artistic angle limiting myself to only two colors.


Controls:
WASD/Left Joystick - Movement
Mouse/Right Joystick - Camera
Space/A - Jump/Double Jump
C/B- Roll
Shift/RT - Sprint
Left Alt - Pause
